title.en: Why I Hate Genshin Impact and the Wave of Copycat Products
title.zh: 为什么我讨厌原神和一众跟风的产品

description.en: An honest rant on why Genshin Impact and its imitators leave me cold—exploring monetization, design clichés, and the hollow feeling of open-world déjà vu.
description.zh: 坦率吐槽：原神及其模仿者为何让我提不起劲——谈氪金套路、设计陈词滥调，以及开放世界“似曾相识”的空洞感。
